Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for player state reactions.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

playEventFlagId0.Wiki: The playback condition flag for this reaction.

talkParamId0.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

playEventFlagId1.Wiki: The playback condition flag for this reaction.

talkParamId1.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

playEventFlagId2.Wiki: The playback condition flag for this reaction.

talkParamId2.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

playEventFlagId3.Wiki: The playback condition flag for this reaction.

talkParamId3.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

playEventFlagId4.Wiki: The playback condition flag for this reaction.

talkParamId4.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

dispLimitNum.Wiki: The maximum number of instances of this reaction.

dispCoolTime.Wiki: The minimum amount of time that must pass between repeats of this reaction. In seconds.

answerCategoryOffsetId.Wiki: The offset ID to apply for this reaction. -1 means no interaction
